name: VAIRIX Software Development
description:
VAIRIX Software Development is a web & mobile app development boutique based in Uruguay that helps US startups and businesses build and grow through nearshore end-to-end development and staff augmentation services.
 
We are an agile, highly responsive team of expert developers ready to help you scale, build innovative products and reach your business goals. We excel at Ruby on Rails, React, React Native, Node.js and AngularJS.
 
We work with a select number of long-term partners who continue to choose us for our convenient timezone, competitive rates and proven track record of successful projects. Get in touch to meet the team and get your next project started.
